cause.description:
NO DONATION REQUIRED.
We are seeking 200+ pledges of $120 to hire a venue and have a NYE party. By supporting this cause you are making a pledge. However, you do not owe any money until we know this will get off the ground.
1) Venue hire - Fort Denison, Sydney Harbour for NYE.
2) Band hire
3) Alcohol.
4) Theming - 'TOGA PARTY' with Roman pillars, ivy, ceasar, waiters, security and shuttle boat.
5) Any money left over get donated to Amnesty International
6) Theme, band and location may change based on feedback. We will keep you posted.
1. Invite as many people as I can
2. Toga
3. Not to wear boardies underneath (optional)
4. Party into the new year like there is no tomorrow
cause.mission: DO NOT DONATE - Only seeking Pledges of money for NYE party... well why not!
cause.name: Huge NYE Party
